text:
[Verse]
Skyline's glowing bright tonight
Dreams can catch the morning light
Stars are whispering your name
All the world is just a game

[Verse 2]
Chasing shadows down the street
City's heartbeat kept the beat
Neon signs and midnight haze
Makes us want to dance for days

[Chorus]
Let it go under starlit skies
Feel the music take you high
Every moment sparks to life
In the dreamer's skyline light

[Verse 3]
Windows open take a chance
Feel the rush in every glance
Bright horizon stories told
In our hearts we will be bold

[Bridge]
We are boundless wild and free
In this urban galaxy
Hold my hand let's touch the stars
Love's our guide and here we are

[Chorus]
Let it go under starlit skies
Feel the music take you high
Every moment sparks to life
In the dreamer's skyline light
title: Dreamer's Skyline
